question: Which of the following was the first sultan of Golconda to assume the title of sultan and to issue coins in his own name?
explanation: Ibrahim Qutb Shah was the first sultan of Golconda kingdom to assume the title of sultan and to issue coins in his own name. Ibrahim Qutb Shah was the son of Sultan Quli Qutb-ul Mulk and came to throne in 1550 CE.
